actovia.name: Actovia
bullets: Lead the UI/UX redesign and development of the Actovia Application. Currently maintaining and developing new features for the application.
Developed and now improving an internal custom CRM to work specifically with the Actovia Application.
Working closely with Backend and SQL developers using JIRA and pushed for Agile methods.
Streamlined workflow with Task Runners (Gulp & Webpack), SCSS, Babel and new ES JS standards with documentation for the team.

tradetrendy.name: Trade Trendy
bullets: Lead the development of Trade Trendy to revolutionize the online clothing market. Trade Trendy was an online marketplace to trade used clothing, shoes, and accessories.
Developed the application using Ruby on Rails framework with Bootstrap on the front end.
Produced a scalable architecture for expanding the business as user base grew using AWS.
Conducted weekly sprint goals with another developer to meet deadlines.

zinnia.name: Zinnia Development
bullets: Incorporated Zinnia Development LLC for my hobby on creating websites for small businesses officially in 2019.
Started developing websites for businesses in 2014.
Designed and developed over two dozen small business websites since ineption.
